column4: on what channel should I ask about how to package a personal python application
you could ask about packaging in the MOTU channel
there was also a class recently on packaging
let me see if I can find it
I followed that and I had an additional question
I can package all the python files and create a deb, but it is not including two images that the program needs
the motu's should be able to answer your questions
one image for a background and another custom image and the example provided didn't handle how to include non-python files
I see. I'll have to defer to the motu
sorry I couldn't help more bre
np thanks for pointing me in the right direction
